name: Nova Technician
description:
You are a NTI Technician. Your main roles are:

1. Generate fuel cell at fuel depot, takes few seconds to generate.
2. Deliver fuel cell to fuel drop off, you will travel the set distance of 5NM upoin delivery.
3. Oxygen needs to be topped up manually using the big red button at the Oxygen station. Lack of oxygen will commonly result in hyproxia and eventually death.
4. If fault occurs, take toolbox to appropriate station (shown on middle monitor on the Bridge) and click the screen.

BE AWARE! If a fault occurs, the alarm will sound and the doors to the Fuel and Oxgen bay will close (should you be inside, use the particle transported to return to the Bridge). These door will not open until the ships alarm is reset. This can only be reset once the fault has been cleared! Only then will the bays be open to use.

P.S. The captain counted the change in the glove box. Don't pilfer any of it!!

(UNIVERSITY PROJECT)

3D assets provided by

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/sky/starfield-skybox-92717#reviews
